protein.specific_function: Involved in the assembly of mitochondrial iron-sulfur proteins. Probably involved in the binding of an intermediate of Fe/S cluster assembly

reference.reference_text: Cozar-Castellano I, del Valle Machargo M, Trujillo E, Arteaga MF, Gonzalez T, Martin-Vasallo P, Avila J: hIscA: a protein implicated in the biogenesis of iron-sulfur clusters. Biochim Biophys Acta. 2004 Aug 2;1700(2):179-88.
